content.rendered:
• Welding Mobile

  • Metalwork Maintenance

  • Arranging installation

  • Business To Business Metalwork

  • Bespoke Metalwork services

  • Stainless steel fabrications

  • Welding Mobile

Welding Mobile

All of our metal fabricators are fully qualified and certified. We safely execute welding services, both on-site and at our workshop in Park Royal, West London.
We are able to weld; mild steel, cast iron, stainless steel, aluminium and brass for both commercial and residential projects. We also offer an emergency welding
mobile service. Contact us on 02089642857 or complete our quick and easy form for a quick quote.

Repairing Services – Metal repair and restoration

Big Ferro specialise in repairing and restoring all metalwork. Whether you have a requirement for a commercial project or residential project, you can rely on us. Our structural steel welding services include, but are not limited to; gate welding repairs, railing welding repairs, handrail welding repairs, boat welding repairs, staircase welding repairs and more.

  • Metalwork Maintenance

How to keep your metal gates and railings in good condition

TTo keep your gates and railings functioning well and looking great for as long as possible, Big Ferro offer two options:

  • Wrought iron gates and railings can be zinc plated. This prevents rust from forming on the metal and helps to preserve its condition for as long as possible.
  • If you choose not to have zinc plating, Big Ferro can coat your gates or railings in black primer. You can then paint them in the colour and finish that you would like. We recommend that you use an appropriate protective paint, and you should expect a re-paint to be necessary every 3-5 years.

Big Ferro also provides comprehensive mobile welding repair and shot/sand blasting services in and around London. Please click here to read more.

  • Arranging installation

Big Ferro offer a fully managed design, supply and installation service. However, if you choose to fit your gates independently, we are able to provide detailed guidelines on how to do this. There is a standard flat fee that we charge for this service (depending on gate range and size).

Why install with Big Ferro?

  • Experienced and reliable installation team – A member of our experienced in-house team will install your gates for you with minimal fuss. We ensure that we are on time and complete the job to the highest standards. We will always leave your premises clean and tidy.
  • 100% care and protection – Your Gates are designed, produced and packaged at our Workshop Head Quarters in West London and delivered safely by our Team. This ensures that there is no damage in transit.
  • One company, one standard – Here at Big ferro, we pride ourselves on Teamwork. We ensure that all of our services are completed in house, in order to manage time and efficiency.

Please contact our Team on 020 8964 2857 to arrange installation and find out more details regarding the service or to get an advice on how to install our products.

  • Business To Business Metalwork

Big Ferro have a large portfolio of commercial clients for whom we provide; design, supply, fabrication and installation services. Our services include bespoke metal gates and railings as well as highly complex structural products.

We conduct detailed consultations with our clients in order to understand their needs and requirements and execute all metalwork services to the highest standards. During the consultation process, we will discuss your design requirements, budgets, time scales, measurements and more. Once the initial consultation is complete, we will arrange a site visit to obtain accurate measurements which can then be incorporated into CAD designs.

When the Client is pleased with the final designs and specifications, annotated with all measurements taken from the site, our welding team can then fabricate the necessary metalwork at our workshop.

Our team of fabricators possess a wealth of experience and talent. Utilising both traditional techniques, as well as modern equipment and facilities, we are able to create a spectrum of metalwork designs for our Clients. Our clients comprise of  interior designers, architects, construction firms as well as international corporations.

Whether you seek metalwork services by way of  gates and railings, balconies and canopies or multi-level metal staircases, we have the competencies and capabilities to deliver results that will not disappoint. Metalwork is available in mild steel, stainless steel and wrought iron.

Big Ferro Limited seeks to blend the standards of a bygone age, both in terms of quality, finish, and customer service with modern technology, to provide a perfect synergy for our Clients, to whom we aim to provide a smooth, trouble-free Client experience.

Please feel free to contact our Team on 0208 964 2857 for further information, or alternatively email info@bigferro.co.uk.

  • Bespoke Metalwork services

Big Ferro prides itself of employing the most talented artisans and this is evident through the meticulous detail provided in the design process. We will advise you on traditional and modern styles and trends and bring your vision to life. We specialise in bespoke and made to measure:

  • Metal gates and railings
  • Balconies and canopies
  • Handrails and Balustrades
  • Metal staircases and emergency fire escapes
  • Bespoke Metal furniture

  • Stainless steel fabrications

A modern look

Big Ferro Limited is particularly proud of its fabrication and installation of superb quality bespoke Stainless Steel products all at competitive prices.

We are able to fabricate Stainless Steel balustrades, balconies and an entire spectrum of structural products, all from the initial site survey through the design process to fabrication and installation.

Our range includes Framed Glass Balustrades, Frame less glass Balustrades, Juliet and Balconies, Canopies, and furniture and every type of Stainless Steel customized project. Stainless steel balustrades and other products provide a futuristic feel and have a considerable durability and longevity. Stainless Steel can also be combined sympathetically to create a great synergy between classic and modern designs. Our Stainless Steel balustrades can be fabricated with round, square or flat posts and handrails. All our designs and products meet British Standards and Building Regulations. The balustrades may also incorporate horizontal or vertical bars with grill in-fills. We can also fabricate child friendly balustrades and ones which comply with the provisions of the Disability Discrimination Act 2010 guidelines.
